workflow.name: Transform video transcripts into multi-platform social media posts with Groq AI
workflow.description:
# Overview

This workflow automates the process of turning your video transcripts into platform-specific social media posts using AI.
It reads any uploaded transcript file, analyzes the text, and automatically generates full-length, engaging posts with image prompts for Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, Reddit, and WhatsApp.

Perfect for creators, marketers, and automation builders who want to repurpose long-form content into viral posts, all in one click.

# How it Works

- The Manual Trigger starts the workflow.

- The Read Binary File node imports your video transcript (TXT format).
- The Move Binary Data and Set nodes convert it into a text string for processing.
- The AI Agent (LangChain) powered by Groq AI analyzes the transcript and generates human-like social media posts with realistic image prompts.
- The Function Node parses and structures the output by platform.
- The Google Sheets Node automatically saves all content ‚Äî ready for scheduling or publishing.
- The SerpAPI Integration enhances contextual awareness by referencing real-time search trends.

# Set Up Steps

- Setting up this workflow typically takes 5‚Äì10 minutes.
- Connect your Google Sheets account (OAuth2).
- Connect your Groq AI and SerpAPI credentials.
- Upload your transcript file (e.g., from YouTube or podcast).
- Run the workflow to instantly generate platform-specific posts and prompts.
- View all results automatically saved in Google Sheets.
- Detailed instructions are included as sticky notes inside the workflow.

# Use Cases

- Turn YouTube videos or podcasts into multi-platform social content
- Auto-generate daily social posts using transcripts
- Build AI-powered repurposing systems for agencies or creators
- Save creative teams hours of manual copywriting work

# Requirements

- n8n account (self-hosted or cloud)
- Groq AI API Key
- SerpAPI Key (for optional trend enhancement)
- Google Sheets connection

nodes.name: Read Transcript File
nodes.notes: Upload your video transcript as a text file

parameters.text:
=You are an elite social media copywriter & creative strategist with 10+ years of experience crafting viral, high-converting content across all platforms.
You‚Äôve generated $50M+ in revenue through social content, deeply understand 2025 algorithms, and specialize in emotion + psychology-based engagement copy.

You think like a storyteller, write like a human, and structure like a growth strategist.

üé¨ INPUT:

Analyze the following transcript or text input:

{{ $json.data }}


Extract the core message, key insight, and emotional hook ‚Äî then create content that makes people stop, feel, and respond.

‚öôÔ∏è GLOBAL WRITING RULES (Apply to ALL platforms)

HOOK PSYCHOLOGY:

First 3 seconds must interrupt the scroll

Use curiosity, emotion, or relatability (‚ÄúI wasted 5 hours before realizing this‚Ä¶‚Äù)

Never start with ‚ÄúHey guys‚Äù or ‚ÄúIn this video‚Äù

HUMAN VOICE:

Conversational, confident tone ‚Äî like texting a smart friend

Use contractions, rhetorical questions, and emotional contrast

Avoid generic AI or corporate words like unlock, elevate, empower

VALUE-FIRST:

Give the reader something to learn, feel, or fix within 10 words

Use numbers, results, or relatable pain points

ENGAGEMENT PSYCHOLOGY:

Always end with a comment question or reflection

Create emotional triggers: frustration ‚Üí realization ‚Üí relief

HASHTAG SYSTEM (MANDATORY):

Each platform must use realistic, trending, and context-matching hashtags

Hashtags should follow 2025 trends in AI, automation, marketing, productivity, or solopreneurship

Use proper CamelCase (#AIAutomation not #aiautomation)

Never output placeholders like [#YourTag]

IMAGE PROMPT RULES (MANDATORY):
For every platform, write a detailed image prompt (to be used with image generation).
Each should describe:

Main visual concept

Emotional tone

Color scheme

Style (flat, 3D, realistic, etc.)

Text overlay (if any)

Focal point and composition

CONSISTENCY RULE:

Each platform‚Äôs post must feel complete, not shorter than others

Output must include both ‚Äúpost‚Äù and ‚ÄúimagePrompt‚Äù sections

üîµ FACEBOOK_POST

Audience: 35‚Äì65, prefers longer story-driven, comment-based posts
Goal: Emotional relatability + practical takeaway
Length: 180‚Äì250 words
Hashtags: 3‚Äì5 (broad + niche + branded)

Structure:

Hook (emotion or curiosity)

Story/problem

Lesson or insight

Reflection question

3‚Äì5 relevant hashtags

ImagePrompt Example Style:
Explain visual contrast, expression, and color (e.g., ‚Äúfrustrated person + clean workflow graphic, orange-blue tones, text overlay: ‚ÄòLoop. Don‚Äôt Repeat Mistakes.‚Äô‚Äù)

üü© WHATSAPP_CHANNEL

Audience: Mobile, personal, short attention span
Goal: Quick value, emotional tone, conversational
Length: 120‚Äì180 words
Hashtags: None
Structure:

1-line hook

Short story or value insight

3‚Äì4 bullet takeaways

Question ending

2‚Äì3 emojis max
ImagePrompt: Simple, square, minimalist, high-contrast, emotionally expressive (e.g., ‚Äúhalf chaos half clean automation flow, text overlay: ‚ÄòFrom Chaos ‚ûú Flow‚Äô‚Äù).

üîµ LINKEDIN_POST

Audience: 25‚Äì55, professional, credibility + insight focused
Goal: Teach + engage + open discussion
Length: 150‚Äì300 words
Hashtags: 6‚Äì9 (industry, professional, trending, branded)

Structure:

Hook with stat, lesson, or contrarian take

Brief personal or relatable context

Insight or framework

Actionable conclusion + question
ImagePrompt: Clean, polished, corporate-friendly, subtle gradients or infographics. Text overlay under 5 words (e.g., ‚ÄúFix Your Loops. Fix Your Workflow.‚Äù)

üü£ INSTAGRAM_CAPTION

Audience: 18‚Äì44, visual, story + aesthetics
Goal: Relatable micro-story + strong hook before ‚Äú‚Ä¶more‚Äù cutoff
Length: 120‚Äì180 words
Hashtags: 12‚Äì18 (split between caption and first comment)

Structure:

Hook line

Micro-story or insight

Short call-to-action question

Hashtag block (broad + niche + branded mix)
ImagePrompt: Reels cover or feed post ‚Äî dynamic, aesthetic, bold typography, 3D gradients or split-scene visuals. Text overlay ‚â§ 5 words.

üß° REDDIT_POST

Audience: Technical, community-driven, authenticity first
Goal: Teach something useful + invite discussion
Length: 200‚Äì400 words
Hashtags: None
Structure:

Honest title (‚ÄúI [did X] and here‚Äôs what happened‚Äù)

Context

Steps or insights

Result or reflection

Discussion question
ImagePrompt: Authentic diagram, screenshot-style, educational ‚Äî no branding or polish.

üö® CRITICAL EXECUTION RULES

Maintain delimiter and JSON format exactly like this:

[
  { "platform": "Facebook", "post": "...", "imagePrompt": "..." },
  { "platform": "WhatsApp", "post": "...", "imagePrompt": "..." },
  { "platform": "LinkedIn", "post": "...", "imagePrompt": "..." },
  { "platform": "Instagram", "post": "...", "imagePrompt": "..." },
  { "platform": "Reddit", "post": "...", "imagePrompt": "..." }
]


Never leave imagePrompt empty.

Each post must feel human, emotional, and insightful.

Use real trending hashtags ‚Äî don‚Äôt repeat across platforms unless natural.

Vary rhythm and tone (short + long sentences).

Always include a question at the end of each post.

Use emotional storytelling + data-backed insight balance.

Each post must feel ready to publish ‚Äî not an outline.

Now generate full-length, scroll-stopping posts for every platform (Facebook, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Instagram, Reddit)
‚Üí Each with real hashtags and image prompts that match the emotion, topic, and audience.

Every word should make the reader stop, feel, and act.

parameters.content: # CONTENT WRITTING WORKFLOW THAT WORKS TOTALLY FREE USING GROQ

# üìö Content Writing Automation Workflow (AI + n8n)

üé• **Watch the Full Tutorial**
[![Watch on YouTube](https://img.youtube.com/vi/UoSDEUE8otg/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/UoSDEUE8otg)

This workflow automatically transforms your **video transcripts** into ready-to-publish social media content across multiple platforms ‚Äî Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, Reddit, and WhatsApp.

It uses **AI (Groq + LangChain Agent)** to understand your transcript, extract insights, and generate viral, platform-tailored posts ‚Äî each with a unique image prompt ready for creative generation.

üìÑ **Key Features**
- Upload any transcript file ‚Üí instantly generates complete social posts for 5 platforms  
- Uses **Groq AI + LangChain Agent** for powerful and fast content generation  
- Automatically creates platform-specific image prompts  
- Saves all outputs to **Google Sheets** for easy publishing  
- Integrates **SerpAPI** for trend-aware optimization  

üöÄ **Perfect For:** content creators, agencies, marketers, and automation builders who want to turn long-form video or transcript content into engaging, multi-platform social media posts ‚Äî automatically.

---

üîó **Created by:** Muhammad Shaheer  
üí° **YouTube Channel:** [https://www.youtube.com/@BOTNEXA](https://www.youtube.com/@ShaheerAutomation)  
üìß **For collaborations:** shaheerawan001@gmail.com
üîó **LINKEDIN:** www.linkedin.com/in/muhammad-shaheer-898513192

user.name: Muhammad Shaheer Awan
user.bio: Automation strategist and n8n expert with extensive experience designing AI-powered workflows for lead generation, data scraping, social media automation, and CRM integration. I help businesses streamline processes, reduce manual work, and boost efficiency. Explore my templates or book a consultation for custom n8n automation solutions.

data.details: The Function node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow. Unlike the Function Item node, this node does not operate on incoming node data per-item. Instead, you must iterate over multiple items of incoming data yourself. This can be useful if you're performing data transformation where you want to manipulate the number of items being outputted by the node (i.e. 1 item is inputted in with nested object, 10 items are outputted without any nested objects)
